 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמַם‎</span>] **verb** ==darken, dim== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cover, veil, conceal***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲמַם‎</span> ***grow dark***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲמָמֻהוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.31.8|Ezek 31:8]] dubious, but probably (as [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]) cedars ***did*** not ***eclipse him***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲמָמוּךָ‎</span> [[Ezek.28.3|Ezek 28:3]] no secret ***do they hold dark*** (= is held dark) for thee ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:117x»§ 117x</sup>). **Hoph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוּעַם זָהָב‎</span> [[Lam.4.1|Lam 4:1]] (figurative) ***how is the gold dimmed !*** compare [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲמָמִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַמְמֵי‎</span> see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַם‎</span> above <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִמָּנוּאֵל‎</span> see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> above
